description:
This course is intended for medical students both UG and PG (from any speciality) as an introduction to Psychiatry and other mental health issues. It will be useful for Psychology and Neurosciences students too as it provides an overview of Psychiatric illnesses and their treatment as well as the biological /psychological basis of behavior.

                                            Syllabus
                        MODULE 1 - Brain and Behaviour â€“approaches- Neuroanatomy- Neurophysiology- Imaging- electrophysiology- Psychology
MODULE 2 - Diagnostic process in Psychiatry- Mental Status Examination1- Mental status examination 2- Classificatory systems- Investigation- Psychological testing
MODULE 3 - Psychiatric Disorders and their treatment-1- Organic syndromes- Schizophrenia- Mood Disorders- Anxiety disorders- Obsessive Compulsive disorders
MODULE 4 - Psychiatric Disorders and their treatment -2- Childhood Disorders-introduction- Autism- Learning disability- ADHD- Other disorders
title: Psychiatry - An overview
